Walter T. Foster - Wikipedia
s: November 14, 2024 - Walter Thomas Foster (1891–1981) was an American entrepreneur, artist, art instructor, writer, editor and publisher. The Walter Foster Publishing Company's line of low-cost art manuals were widely distributed to art stores, often displayed in a metal rack specially made for Foster's oversized ...

t: One Hundred Years and Counting: Spotlight on Walter Foster
s: April 19, 2022 - For Anne Landa, group publisher at the Quarto Group, the enduring appeal of the imprint’s signature title can be attributed to the book’s reader-friendly design—which features simple step-by-step lessons that speak to beginners— as well as the emotional connection readers have to the Walter Foster brand...

s: Founded in Laguna Beach, California, ... leading publisher of instructional art books and kits for adults and children for nearly a century. Filled with tips, techniques, and step-by-step projects, as well as practical exercises and creative prompts, the fun and engaging books in the Walter Foster line have helped people around the world discover their artistic talents, hone their creativity, and learn new mediums.
